info.title: CMS HITECH APD API
info.description: The API for the CMS HITECH APD app.

get.description: Get a list of all user affiliations for a US State

parameters.name: stateId
parameters.description: 2-letter US State or Territory abbreviation, lowercase

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The filter status of the affiliations for this US State

filter_status.description: The filter status of the affiliations for this US State

200.description: List of all user affiliations for a US State

state_id.description: 2-letter US State or Territory abbreviation, lowercase

role_id.description: ID of the role applied to this user for this US State

status.description: The status of the user role for this US State

updated_by.description: ID of the user who last updated this record

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

post.description: Create a request for the currently logged in user to be affiliated with a US State

parameters.name: stateId
parameters.description: 2-letter US State or Territory abbreviation, lowercase

400.description: Record exists, or US State ID is invalid

401.description: The user is not logged in

get.description: Get a single user affiliation with a US State

parameters.name: stateId
parameters.description: 2-letter US State or Territory abbreviation, lowercase

200.description: A single user affiliation with a US State

state_id.description: 2-letter US State or Territory abbreviation, lowercase

role_id.description: ID of the role applied to this user for this US State

status.description: The status of the user role for this US State

updated_by.description: ID of the user who last updated this record

400.description: The stateId and affiliation ID do not correspond to a known record

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

patch.description: Update a user affiliation with a US State

parameters.name: stateId
parameters.description: 2-letter US State or Territory abbreviation, lowercase

roleId.description: ID of the role applied to this user for this US State

status.description: The status of the user role for this US State

400.description: US State ID and affiliation ID are invalid, roleId is invalid, or status is invalid

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

get.summary: Get all of the APDs available to the user
get.description: Get a list of all apds associated with requesting user

200.description: The list of a user’s apds

created.description: Timestamp of when this APD was created

status.description: Current status of the APD; e.g., "draft", "archived", etc.

updated.description: Timestamp of the last save to this APD

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

post.summary: Create a new draft APD associated with the user's state
post.description: Create a new draft APD for the current user's state

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

get.description: Where the /apds GET method only returns a small portion of all APDs, this method returns all of one

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the apd to get

400.description: The apd ID does not match any known apds

401.description: The apd ID does not match any known apds for the user

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

patch.description: Update an APD in the system using a set of JSON Patch objects. If state profile information is included, the profile information is also updated for the APD's state.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the apd to update

requestBody.description: A set of JSON Patch objects to be applied to the APD to change it

op.description: The JSON Patch operation. This API only supports add, remove, and replace.

path.description: The path of the value to be operated on, specified as a JSON Pointer

value.description: For add or replace operations, the new value to be applied

400.description: The update failed due to a problem with the input data

items.description: If the requested patch caused a validation failure, the API will return a list of invalid paths

path.description: A JSON Pointer path whose patched value is invalid

oneOf.description: If the requested patch failed for unknown reasons, nothing will be returned

401.description: The apd ID does not match any known apds for the user

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

delete.description: Updates an APD's status to "archive" and prevents it from being edited

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the apd to archive

400.description: Invalid request, such as requesting to archive an APD that is not editable

401.description: The apd ID does not match any known apds for the user

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

post.summary: Upload a file associated with an APD
post.description: Uploads a file, associates it with a given APD, and stores any provided metadata.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the apd the file is associated with

metadata.description: arbitrary metadata to attach to the file

200.description: The URL of the uploaded file, absolute, relative to the API host

url.description: The URL of the uploaded file, absolute, relative to the API host

400.description: Invalid request, such as requesting to archive an APD that is not editable

401.description: The apd ID does not match any known apds for the user

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

415.description: The file is not a valid format

post.summary: Log an event performed on an APD
post.description: Posts an event, associates it with a given APD, and stores any provided metadata.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the apd the event is associated with

eventType.description: the type of the event performed

metadata.description: anny additional metadata to add to the log

200.description: The status of the event being logged

success.description: whether the event was successfully logged

400.description: The apd ID does not match any known apds

401.description: The apd ID does not match any known apds for the user

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

get.summary: Get a file associated with an APD
get.description: Returns a file that is associated with a given APD. This method returns a data blob with no information about the contents (such as the content-type); it is the responsibility of the consumer to understand the context of the file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the apd the file is associated with

parameters.name: fileID
parameters.description: The ID of the file to get

400.description: The file does not belong to the APD or does not exist

get.summary: Gets the list of all activities
get.description: Get a list of all activities in the system

200.description: The list of activities known to the system

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

get.summary: Gets the list of all roles
get.description: Get a list of all roles in the system

200.description: The list of roles known to the system

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

get.description: Get the eAPD system access documentation
Get information about the current user

items.description: Names of system activities this user can perform

id.description: User's unique ID, used internally and for identifying the user when interacting with the API

phone.description: The user's phone number, if defined

roles.description: Names of system authorization role this user belongs to

state.description: The state/territory/district that this user is assigned to

401.description: The user is not logged in

get.description: Get a list of all of the active roles

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

get.description: Get a list of all US States and Territories

200.description: List of US States and Territories

id.description: 2-letter US State or Territory abbreviation, lowercase

name.description: Full name of US State or Territory

get.description: Get a single US State or Territiory

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: 2-letter US State or Territory abbreviation, lowercase

id.description: 2-letter US State or Territory abbreviation, lowercase

name.description: Full name of US State or Territory

medicaid_office.description: Contact information for this US State/Territory Medicaid office

400.description: The 2-letter, lowercase US State or Territory ID does not match any records

401.description: The user is not logged in

get.summary: Gets a list of all users
get.description: Get a list of all users in the system

200.description: The list of users known to the system

phone.description: User's phone number; up to 10 digits

position.description: User's position in the state’s Medicaid program

state.description: Two-letter ID of the state this user is associated with, if any

role.description: The user's role name, if any. Can be null.

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

get.summary: Gets the information for a specific user
get.description: Get a specific user in the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to fetch

phone.description: User's phone number; up to 10 digits

position.description: User's position in the state’s Medicaid program

state.description: Two-letter ID of the state this user is associated with, if any

role.description: The user's role name, if any. Can be null.

400.description: The user ID does not match any known users

error.description: A string token indicating the error, which could be translated into a user-readable string for display by the client

401.description: The user is not logged in

403.description: The user does not have permission to perform this activity

created.description: Timestamp of when this APD was created

updated.description: Timestamp of the last save to this APD

state.description: Two-letter ID of the state, territory, or district this APD belongs to, lowercase

name.description: The APD document name, following SEA naming conventions

programOverview.description: An overview of the overall program

narrativeHIE.description: Brief description of HIE-funded activities contained in this APD

narrativeHIT.description: Brief description of HIT-funded activities contained in this APD

narrativeMMIS.description: Brief description of MMIS-funded activities contained in this APD

zip.description: State Medicaid office address ZIP code

^[0-9]{4}$.description: Person's cost for the year described by the property name

hasCosts.description: Whether the person has costs attributable to the project

isPrimary.description: Whether the person is the primary point of contact for the APD

^[0-9]{0,2}.description: FTE equivalent of this person's time dedicated to the project

previousActivitySummary.description: High-level outline of activities approved in previous APD

totalApproved.description: Total approved in the previous APD
Total approved in the previous APD
Total approved in the previous APD
Total approved in the previous APD

fundingSource.description: Federal funding source that applies to this activity

name.description: Activity name, unique within an APD

standardsAndConditions.description: Description of the 11 standards and conditions

doesNotSupport.description: If this activity does not support the standards and conditions, an explanation of why not

supports.description: A description of how this activity supports the standards and conditions

activitySchedule.description: The start and end date for the activity

plannedStartDate.description: The date this activity is planned to be completed

plannedEndDate.description: The date this activity is planned to begin

endDate.description: The date this milestone is planned to be met

amt.description: State personnel's total cost for the federal fiscal year

perc.description: Number of FTEs this state personnel will spend on the project for the federal fiscal year

category.description: Expense category, such as "Hardware, software, and licensing"

^[0-9]{4}$.description: Expense amount for the given federal fiscal year

hours.description: Number of hours the contractor is expected to work for the given federal fiscal year

rate.description: Contractor hourly rate for the given federal fiscal year

useHourly.description: Whether to use hourly rates for this contractor

start.description: When the contractor resource will begin work; date only

end.description: When the contractor resource will end work; date only

years.description: Details of each year the contractor resource will be working

^[0-9]{4}$.description: Contractor resource cost of the year

methodology.description: Description of the cost allocation methodology

federal.description: Federal share for this activity for this year, from 0 to 100

state.description: State share for this activity for this year, from 0 to 100

other.description: Other amount (dollars) for this activity for this year

quarterlyFFP.description: Federal share of this activity cost, by expense type, per fiscal quarter

contractors.description: Contractor costs for the given quarter of the given federal fiscal year

inHouse.description: In-house (state personnel + non-personnel) costs for the given quarter of the given federal fiscal year

assurancesAndCompliances.description: Federal citations that states must assert compliance with. This is a free-form object.

^[1-4]$.description: EH or EC payment or count for the given federal fiscal year and quarter
